body.name: OVELLIC Karaoke Microphone for Kids, Wireless Bluetooth Karaoke Microphone with LED Lights, Portable Handheld Mic Speaker Machine, Great Gifts Toys for Girls Boys Adults All Age (Rose Gold)

features: 【Integrated Microphone】The portable karaoke microphone, let you sing anywhere! It will be an awesome Bluetooth speaker If you want to enjoy music. Even more surprising is that it also can be used as an FM Radio and Voice Changer. Perfect for KTV singing, gathering singing, family singing, travel singing, car stereo, instrument recording, interviews and live, etc.

【Bluetooth 5.0】After turn on the Bluetooth function, When you turn on the microphone, the microphone will automatically connect. Instant pairing, auto reconnection, improved connection stability and improved battery performance. The latest Bluetooth 5.0 with TWS technology on the microphone, provides faster pairing, stable connection and signal transmission (50ft no obstacle range). Powerful Bluetooth 5.0 chip that perfectly matches tablets, laptops, iOS, and Android smartphones!

【Surprisingly Loud Volume】Equipped the composite horn loudspeaker with a bigger dynamic driver, it has HiFi sound quality, Deep bass, and 3D surround stereo, feel like you are listening to the concert on the scene, providing a realistic sound for you. Built-in high-definition microphones, which can maintain the Real voice by minimizing environmental noise, so that your voice is always clear and clean.

【Long Playback Time】The karaoke microphone with a 3000mAh battery for up to 10 hours of playtime at the largest volume on a full charge. Supported Wireless Connection, Cable USB Connection and TF card Connection. Whether at home or outdoors, these microphones will meet all of your needs.

【Great Gifts】The karaoke microphone has a stylish appearance. The lighting beats with the rhythm of the music, perfectly creating a pleasant and romantic atmosphere for you. With this microphone, everywhere is the stage. Let your kids start their little solo concert now. Say goodbye to wired microphone tangles and say hello to the freedom of movement! It is a great birthday or festival gift for your kids, friends, or family.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: OVELLIC Karaoke Microphone Portable Wireless Bluetooth Karaoke Microphones for Home Party Outdoor.The great gifts for parents, friends, and children. Whether it's family gatherings, trips, or camping, just enjoy it.Microphones use high quality chipsets, which produce more amazing KTV live acoustics and clearer music rhythm and echo reverb.
The Great Gifts For Kids Voice Changing Fun Wonderful Live Performance Bring Music To Life

Mini home KTV for music playing and singing at any time. Enjoy Your Mini Home KTV! Besides as a karaoke microphone, the wireless microphone also can be used as a speaker and a recorder.The colorful LED lights flash with the rhythm of the music. it's never a dream to use this dynamic microphone for live performances.By connecting the microphone to the smart device, practice and share your favorite songs on music apps (YouTube, Pandora, Spotify, etc)
Are you still worried about children’s gifts? An interesting, multi-functional OVELLIC Bluetooth karaoke microphone is your great choice!

High quality wireless karaoke mic featured with: - Multi-function 4 in 1(microphone, recorder, speaker and player) - Colorful led light makes the atmosphere high - 3 layered noise reduction, keep superior sound output - Equipped with the professional audio processor, echo sound, music sound, feel free to adjust - Multiple connection methods, High speed Bluetooth connection, compatible with all smart devices (within 10 meters), USB cable connection - Connected the audio cable, recording your own music(The recording will be saved in your phone app, not the microphone) - Support 32GB TF card (not included) Package Include: 1 x Wireless Karaoke Microphone 1 x Charge Cable 1 x Instruction manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sound was great for the price
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the OVELLIC Karaoke Microphone for Kids from Amazon and I must say, I am very impressed with the product. The wireless Bluetooth microphone produces great sound quality and the LED lights add a fun and festive touch to any party or event. The battery life is excellent and provides hours of entertainment without the need for frequent charging. The design is sleek and user-friendly, making it easy for anyone to operate. Overall, I highly recommend this product for anyone looking for a fun and high-quality karaoke microphone for their next gathering or party. The OVELLIC Karaoke Microphone is a must-have for any music lover or party enthusiast!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My son loves this, did take some time to figure out all the buttons and everything. It can be loud but also soft so a big plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the color options and connecting to any device is super easy ! Bought for my daughter and she uses it all the time . Super affordable and also so convenient that it charges! Will definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Everything worked well. Pretty fun device's command voice has a pretty stronge chinese accent. Made it fun to switch modes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A true and versatille five in one microphone
reviews.reviewText: The Ovellic is great and truly worth ranking number one in best seller chart. For no more than 16 bucks you can enjoy free singing in amplified huge sound via a neat, delicately designed microphone, which has a big variety of colour choices to choose from. Some like it in traditional black and some the flamboyant rose gold, and I chose silver space plus...Pros: in one mic, you can sing, record, listen to the radio, treat the mic as a bluetooth speaker, and what's more, you can hook the microphone to desktop pc to transfer digital data, which is absolutely a real five in one design and device, which can satisfy all your musical needs in daily life, no matter that is singing, emotional release, listening to songs, listening to radio, various vocal or instrumental recording purposes...all can bring you gratifying use and need.If buyers find the offer of various colours enticing, you may collect your most favourite colours from the catalogue for just no more than 16 bucks each. I particularly find the silver space and blue ones attractive and beautiful.Buyers should also pay attention to the renewed design of this new Ovellic series and version, which1. allows one button push recording2. more battery capacity3. more flamboyant flourescent lightning when running4. more advanced and acute HD sound reproduction no matter whether in situation of singing, using it as a bluetooth speaker and so on.5. The gain of volumn control and loudness have also improved.Cons: not suitable for studio sound recording; karaoke vocal muddled up with source music and sound; uneven volumn dB increment while tuning up volumn control, that is, either it is too silent or too loud out of sudden, pending further and future technological improvement...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too much or too little. Never just right
reviews.reviewText: This mic is either too much or not enough. I've found that there is no happy medium. When it announces that it's ready to pair or has paired with Bluetooth it's so obscenely loud that my daughter for whom I bought it always drops it to cover her ears.When you attempt to sing, however, it never seems to get a good volume. It either requires your mouth directly against the top of the mic to get loud singing or singing from any distance means the mic doesn't pick up the voice at all.The voice change features are pretty cool but cannot be selected at will, you just have to cycle through them to get what you want.It's functional, but nothing great and takes a lot of hassle to get to the fun part of singing along with songs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much fun!!!
reviews.reviewText: We use this karaoke microphone almost everyday!!! For parties, football games, you name it! It’s so fun!!! We will buy more very soon!! Great gift as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good sound quality
reviews.reviewText: I love the sound quality of this karaoke mike is good. It connects to BT seamlessly .I bought it for my son’s 4th birthday. He loved it! It is very light weight which makes it kids friendly as wellI would recommended this product.This is impressive product for this price ! It has button for high & low voice as well echo too. This is great product for a family and friends gathering as a karaoke fun.
